text:
@realDonaldTrump Um, the reason that Trump is being ridiculed for appointing Pence in charge of Coronavirus is that Pence's policies have literally led to death. 

That's right, death. 

He is an anti-science, bible-toting nutjob.

At least then he only represented one state.

Now, God help us.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
